pkgmetadata.longdescription: Gaussian Process Panel Modeling // Provides an implementation of Gaussian process panel modeling (GPPM). GPPM is described in Karch, Brandmaier Voelkle (2020; DOI:10.3389/fpsyg.2020.00351) and Karch (2016; DOI:10.18452/17641). Essentially, GPPM is Gaussian process based modeling of longitudinal panel data. 'gppm' also supports regular Gaussian process regression (with a focus on flexible model specification), and multi-task learning.
